channel.title: favorite book quotes
channel.description:
Basicly, post your favorite quotes from books. Mine:
Artemis Fowl 2: The Arcttic Incident - Holly Short: You don't get into that tunnel without science.

item.title: favorite book quotes
item.dc:creator: Fancy_Pants
item.description:
Bolteh:

I’ve given up on reading books that are meant for entertainment (I do like educational/scientific/philosophical books). I’ve tried, oh lord how I’ve tried, but I always end up reading 2-3 pages every few days, so even the shortest of books take months to finish.

i’m like this with fiction in general. i just cannot get into it. any kind of nonfiction is good though, even if it’s intended to entertain.

Read full topic

item.title: favorite book quotes
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
[indent]"The nymph giggled. It was a sound like a stream chuckling over loose rocks. That’s not a metaphor. That was the actual sound. “Good sir, and mortal, I have lived as long as Everworld and longer still. I served the goddess Iris. And would still. But that is a tale for another time.”
Christopher nodded. “Okay, she’s over a thousand years old, which as far as I’m concerned means she can probably take a joke. And buy beer.” - Everworld Tome 4[/indent]

Read full topic

item.title: favorite book quotes
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
This planet has — or rather had — a problem, which was this: most of the people living on it were unhappy for pretty much all of the time. Many solutions were suggested for this problem, but most of these were largely concerned with the movement of small green pieces of paper, which was odd because on the whole it wasn’t the small green pieces of paper that were unhappy.

Read full topic

item.title: favorite book quotes
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

Diziet Sma: “It’s a hat.”

Ah, Use of Weapons, one of my favourite books of all time.

And as for my favourite quote, you can do a lot worse than the opening line of Neuromancer:

William Gibson:

The sky above the port was the color of television, tuned to a dead channel.

Read full topic

item.title: favorite book quotes
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Hit bottom, I guess," he said. "Lights out and suddenly I’m down at the beach making out with Tama Shakowsky. And it’s getting hot, and suddenly I’m seeing… Her. And that’s the end of me making out. Maybe forever. You looking up Hel? - Christopher; Everworld Tome 4.

Read full topic

item.title: favorite book quotes
item.dc:creator: tycho_magnetic_anoma
item.description:
“Humans will always act to preserve their own lives. Except for the times when they don’t.”

“Christians have been expecting the imminent end of the world for millennia.” “But it keeps not ending.” “So far, so good.”

Read full topic

item.title: favorite book quotes
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
Snow Crash (while in a boat chase. Vic is a pro sniper)
“It’s, like, one of them drug dealer boats,” Vic says, looking through his magic sight. “Five guys on it. Headed our way.”
He fires another round. “Correction. Four guys on it.”
Boom. “Correction. They’re not headed our way anymore.”
Boom. A fireball erupts from the ocean two hundred feet away. “Correction. No boat.”

Read full topic
